item.description:
Come and meet new friends!
Men and women whom are ages 40+ looking to meet new people and make social and/or business connections. Our gathering is casual without any pressure. Your host for the evening will make introductions and the rest...is up to you to enjoy.

We meet on the second Tuesday of every month. Add all of the events to your calendar and become a regular!


Is There a Charge?
Yes, there is a registration fee of $5.00 per event.

ATTENDANCE & RSVP POLICY
Please be respectful and if you are not able to attend, change your RSVP.

Location
The location could change from time to time to accommodate as many people as possible, so check your email.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in Trophy's Lounge

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Social and Business Networking
